special_text:
Sacrifice another artifact: Lanion, Beyond Realms phases out. Activate only as a sorcery.
[+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. You may sacrifice another artifact. If you do, draw a card.
[-2]: Target player sacrifices a creature with power greater than or equal to the number of cards in their hand. You gain life equal to its power.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Tap an untapped artifact you control: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.”
